00063 VertexMover::VertexMover( ObjectiveFunction* OF ) 
00064   : QualityImprover(),
00065     objFuncEval( OF ) ,
00066     jacobiOpt(false)
00067   {}
00068 
00069 
00070 VertexMover::~VertexMover() {}
00071 
00072 /*
00073   
00074     +-----------+
00075     |Reset Outer|
00076     |Criterion  |
00077     +-----------+
00078           |
00079           V
00080           +
00081         /   \
00082        /Outer\  YES
00083 +--> <Criterion>-----> DONE
00084 |      \Done?/
00085 |       \   /
00086 |         + 
00087 |         |NO
00088 |         V
00089 |   +-----------+
00090 1   |Reset Mesh |
00091 |   | Iteration |
00092 |   +-----------+
00093 |         |
00094 |         V
00095 |         +
00096 |       /  \
00097 |   NO /Next\
00098 +-----<Patch > <-----+
00099        \    /        |
00100         \  /         |
00101           +          |
00102        YES|          |
00103           V          |
00104     +-----------+    |
00105     |Reset Inner|    |
00106     |Criterion  |    2
00107     +-----------+    |
00108           |          |
00109           V          |  
00110           +          |               
00111         /   \        |
00112        /Inner\  YES  |
00113 +--> <Criterion>-----+    --------------+
00114 |      \Done?/                          |
00115 |       \   /                           |
00116 |         +                             |
00117 |         |NO                           |
00118 |         V                          Inside
00119 3   +-----------+                    Smoother
00120 |   |   Smooth  |                       |
00121 |   |   Patch   |                       |
00122 |   +-----------+                       |
00123 |         |                             |
00124 ----------+               --------------+
00125                       
00126 */        
00127 
00134 double VertexMover::loop_over_mesh( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00135                                     const Settings* settings,
00136                                     MsqError& err )
00137 {
00138   Mesh* mesh = mesh_and_domain->get_mesh();
00139   MeshDomain* domain = mesh_and_domain->get_domain();
00140 
00141   TagHandle coord_tag = 0; // store uncommitted coords for jacobi optimization 
00142   TagHandle* coord_tag_ptr = 0;
00143 
00144   TerminationCriterion* outer_crit = 0;
00145   TerminationCriterion* inner_crit = 0;
00146 
00147     // Clear culling flag, set hard fixed flag, etc on all vertices
00148   initialize_vertex_byte( mesh_and_domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00149 
00150     // Get the patch data to use for the first iteration
00151   OFEvaluator& obj_func = get_objective_function_evaluator();
00152  
00153     // Check for impromer use of MaxTemplate
00154   ObjectiveFunctionTemplate* maxt_ptr = dynamic_cast<MaxTemplate*>(obj_func.get_objective_function());
00155   if (maxt_ptr)
00156   {
00157   QualityImprover* ngqi_ptr = dynamic_cast<NonGradient*>(this);
00158   if (!ngqi_ptr)
00159       std::cout << "Warning: MaxTemplate results in non-differentiable objective function." << std::endl <<
00160                    "   Therefore, it is best to use the NonGradient solver. Other Mesquite" << std::endl <<
00161                    "   solvers require derivative information." << std::endl;
00162   }
00163 
00164   PatchData patch;
00165   patch.set_mesh( mesh );
00166   patch.set_domain( domain );
00167   if (settings)
00168     patch.attach_settings( settings );
00169   bool one_patch = false, inner_crit_terminated, all_culled;
00170   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> patch_vertices;
00171   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> patch_elements;
00172   bool valid;
00173   
00174   PatchSet* patch_set = get_patch_set();
00175   if (!patch_set) {
00176     MSQ_SETERR(err)("No PatchSet for QualityImprover!", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00177     return 0.0;
00178   }
00179   patch_set->set_mesh( mesh );
00180   
00181   std::vector<PatchSet::PatchHandle> patch_list;
00182   patch_set->get_patch_handles( patch_list, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00183 
00184     // check for inverted elements when using a barrietr target metric
00185   TQualityMetric* tqm_ptr = NULL;
00186   TMetricBarrier* tm_ptr = NULL;
00187   AWMetricBarrier* awm_ptr = NULL;
00188   ElemSampleQM* sample_qm_ptr = NULL;
00189   QualityMetric* qm_ptr = NULL;
00190   TQualityMetric* pmeanp_ptr = NULL;
00191   ElementMaxQM* elem_max_ptr = NULL;
00192   ElementAvgQM* elem_avg_ptr = NULL;
00193   ElementPMeanP* elem_pmeanp_ptr = NULL;
00194 
00195   ObjectiveFunctionTemplate* of_ptr =  dynamic_cast<ObjectiveFunctionTemplate*>(obj_func.get_objective_function() );
00196   if (of_ptr)
00197     qm_ptr = of_ptr->get_quality_metric();
00198   if (qm_ptr)
00199   {
00200     pmeanp_ptr = dynamic_cast<TQualityMetric*>(qm_ptr);  // PMeanP case
00201     elem_max_ptr = dynamic_cast<ElementMaxQM*>(qm_ptr);
00202     elem_avg_ptr = dynamic_cast<ElementAvgQM*>(qm_ptr);
00203     elem_pmeanp_ptr = dynamic_cast<ElementPMeanP*>(qm_ptr);
00204   }
00205   if (elem_max_ptr)
00206     sample_qm_ptr = elem_max_ptr->get_quality_metric();
00207   else if (elem_pmeanp_ptr)
00208     sample_qm_ptr = elem_pmeanp_ptr->get_quality_metric();
00209   else if (elem_avg_ptr)
00210     sample_qm_ptr = elem_avg_ptr->get_quality_metric();
00211   else if (pmeanp_ptr)
00212   {
00213     tm_ptr =  dynamic_cast<TMetricBarrier*>(pmeanp_ptr->get_target_metric());
00214     awm_ptr =  dynamic_cast<AWMetricBarrier*>(pmeanp_ptr->get_target_metric());
00215   }
00216    
00217   if (sample_qm_ptr || pmeanp_ptr)
00218   { 
00219     if (!pmeanp_ptr)
00220     {
00221       tqm_ptr = dynamic_cast<TQualityMetric*>(sample_qm_ptr);
00222       if (tqm_ptr)
00223       {
00224         tm_ptr =  dynamic_cast<TMetricBarrier*>(tqm_ptr->get_target_metric());
00225         awm_ptr =  dynamic_cast<AWMetricBarrier*>(tqm_ptr->get_target_metric());
00226       }
00227     }
00228     else
00229     {
00230       tqm_ptr = dynamic_cast<TQualityMetric*>(pmeanp_ptr);
00231     }
00232     
00233     if (tqm_ptr && (tm_ptr || awm_ptr))
00234     {
00235         // check for inverted elements
00236       this->initialize(patch, err); 
00237       std::vector<size_t> handles;
00238  
00239         // set up patch data      
00240       std::vector<PatchSet::PatchHandle>::iterator patch_iter = patch_list.begin();
00241       while( patch_iter != patch_list.end() )
00242       {
00243         do 
00244           {
00245             patch_set->get_patch( *patch_iter, patch_elements, patch_vertices, err );
00246             if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00247             ++patch_iter;
00248           } while (patch_elements.empty() && patch_iter != patch_list.end()) ;
00249 
00250         patch.set_mesh_entities( patch_elements, patch_vertices, err );
00251         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00252     
00253         qm_ptr->get_evaluations( patch, handles, true, err ); // MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00254   
00255           // do actual check for inverted elements
00256         std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00257         double tvalue;
00258         for (i = handles.begin(); i != handles.end(); ++i)
00259         {
00260           bool result = tqm_ptr->evaluate( patch, *i, tvalue, err );
00261           if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00262             return false;    // inverted element detected
00263         }
00264       }
00265     }
00266   }
00267 
00268     // Get termination criteria
00269   outer_crit=this->get_outer_termination_criterion();
00270   inner_crit=this->get_inner_termination_criterion();
00271   if(outer_crit == 0){
00272     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Termination Criterion pointer is Null", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00273     return 0.;
00274   }
00275   if(inner_crit == 0){
00276     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Termination Criterion pointer for inner loop is Null", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00277     return 0.;
00278   }
00279 
00280     // Set Termination Criterion defaults if no other Criterion is set
00281   if ( !outer_crit->criterion_is_set() )
00282     outer_crit->add_iteration_limit(1);
00283   if ( !inner_crit->criterion_is_set() )
00284     inner_crit->add_iteration_limit(10);
00285 
00286     // If using a local patch, suppress output of inner termination criterion
00287   if (patch_list.size() > 1) 
00288     inner_crit->set_debug_output_level(3);
00289   else
00290     one_patch = true;
00291   
00292   if (jacobiOpt) {
00293     coord_tag = get_jacobi_coord_tag(mesh, err);
00294     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00295     coord_tag_ptr = &coord_tag;
00296   }
00297   
00298     // Initialize outer loop
00299     
00300   this->initialize(patch, err);        
00301   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00302   
00303   valid = obj_func.initialize( mesh_and_domain, settings, patch_set, err ); 
00304   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00305   if (!valid) {
00306     MSQ_SETERR(err)("ObjectiveFunction initialization failed.  Mesh "
00307                     "invalid at one or more sample points.", 
00308                     MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00309     goto ERROR;
00310   }
00311   
00312   outer_crit->reset_outer(mesh, domain, obj_func, settings, err); 
00313   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00314   
00315  
00316     // if only one patch, get the patch now
00317   if (one_patch) {
00318     patch_set->get_patch( patch_list[0], patch_elements, patch_vertices, err );
00319     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00320     patch.set_mesh_entities( patch_elements, patch_vertices, err );
00321     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00322   }
00323   
00324    // Loop until outer termination criterion is met
00325   inner_crit_terminated = false;
00326   while (!outer_crit->terminate())
00327   {
00328     if (inner_crit_terminated) {
00329       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Inner termiation criterion satisfied for all patches "
00330                       "without meeting outer termination criterion.  This is "
00331                       "an infinite loop.  Aborting.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00332       break;
00333     }
00334     inner_crit_terminated = true;
00335     all_culled = true;
00336 
00337         int num_patches=0;
00338       // Loop over each patch
00339     std::vector<PatchSet::PatchHandle>::iterator p_iter = patch_list.begin();
00340     while( p_iter != patch_list.end() )
00341     {
00342       if (!one_patch) { // if only one patch (global) re-use the previous one
00343           // loop until we get a non-empty patch.  patch will be empty
00344           // for culled vertices with element-on-vertex patches
00345         do {
00346           patch_set->get_patch( *p_iter, patch_elements, patch_vertices, err );
00347           if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00348           ++p_iter;
00349         } while (patch_elements.empty() && p_iter != patch_list.end()) ;
00350         
00351         if (patch_elements.empty()) { // no more non-culled vertices
00352                 if (0)
00353                   std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk all vertices culled."  << std::endl;
00354           break;
00355         }
00356       
00357         all_culled = false;
00358         patch.set_mesh_entities( patch_elements, patch_vertices, err );
00359         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00360       } else {
00361         ++p_iter;
00362         all_culled = false;
00363       }
00364         
00365             ++num_patches;
00366 
00367         // Initialize for inner iteration
00368         
00369       this->initialize_mesh_iteration(patch, err);
00370       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00371       
00372       obj_func.reset();
00373       
00374       outer_crit->reset_patch( patch, err );
00375       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00376       
00377       inner_crit->reset_inner( patch, obj_func, err );
00378       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00379       
00380       inner_crit->reset_patch( patch, err );
00381       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00382       
00383         // Don't even call optimizer if inner termination 
00384         // criterion has already been met.
00385       if (!inner_crit->terminate())
00386       {
00387         inner_crit_terminated = false;
00388 
00389           // Call optimizer - should loop on inner_crit->terminate()
00390         this->optimize_vertex_positions( patch, err );
00391         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00392       
00393           // Update for changes during inner iteration 
00394           // (during optimizer loop)
00395         
00396         outer_crit->accumulate_patch( patch, err );
00397         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00398         
00399         inner_crit->cull_vertices( patch, obj_func, err );
00400         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00401 
00402                 // FIXME
00403                 if (0)
00404                   {
00405                     inner_crit->cull_vertices_global (patch, 
00406                                                       mesh, domain, settings,
00407                                                       obj_func, err);
00408                     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00409                   }
00410         
00411         patch.update_mesh( err, coord_tag_ptr );
00412         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00413       }
00414     } 
00415 
00416     if (jacobiOpt)
00417       commit_jacobi_coords( coord_tag, mesh, err );
00418 
00419     this->terminate_mesh_iteration(patch, err); 
00420     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00421     
00422     outer_crit->accumulate_outer( mesh, domain, obj_func, settings, err );
00423     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) goto ERROR;
00424     
00425     if (all_culled)
00426       break;
00427   }
00428 
00429 
00430 ERROR:  
00431   if (jacobiOpt)
00432     mesh->tag_delete( coord_tag, err );
00433 
00434     //call the criteria's cleanup funtions.
00435   if (outer_crit) 
00436     outer_crit->cleanup(mesh,domain,err);
00437   if (inner_crit)
00438   inner_crit->cleanup(mesh,domain,err);
00439     //call the optimization cleanup function.
00440   this->cleanup();
00441 
00442   return 0.;
00443 }
00444   
00445 
00446 static void checkpoint_bytes( Mesh* mesh, std::vector<unsigned char>& saved_bytes, MsqError& err)
00447 {
00448   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertexHandlesArray;
00449   mesh->get_all_vertices(vertexHandlesArray, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00450   saved_bytes.resize(vertexHandlesArray.size());
00451   mesh->vertices_get_byte( &vertexHandlesArray[0],
00452                            &saved_bytes[0],
00453                            vertexHandlesArray.size(),
00454                            err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00455 }
00456 
00457 static void restore_bytes( Mesh* mesh, std::vector<unsigned char>& saved_bytes, MsqError& err)
00458 {
00459   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertexHandlesArray;
00460   mesh->get_all_vertices(vertexHandlesArray, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00461   mesh->vertices_set_byte( &vertexHandlesArray[0],
00462                            &saved_bytes[0],
00463                            vertexHandlesArray.size(),
00464                            err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00465 }
00466 
00467   static void save_or_restore_debug_state(bool save)
00468   {
00469     static bool debug[3] = {false,false,false};
00470     if (save) 
00471       {
00472         debug[0] = MsqDebug::get(1);
00473         debug[1] = MsqDebug::get(2);
00474         debug[2] = MsqDebug::get(3);
00475       }
00476     else
00477       {
00478         if (debug[0]) MsqDebug::enable(1);
00479         if (debug[1]) MsqDebug::enable(2);
00480         if (debug[2]) MsqDebug::enable(3);
00481       }
00482   }
00483 
00490 double VertexMover::loop_over_mesh( ParallelMesh* mesh,
00491                                     MeshDomain* domain,
00492                                     const Settings* settings,
00493                                     MsqError& err )
00494 {
00495   std::vector<size_t> junk;
00496   Mesh::VertexHandle vertex_handle;
00497   TagHandle coord_tag = 0; // store uncommitted coords for jacobi optimization 
00498   TagHandle* coord_tag_ptr = 0;
00499   int outer_iter=0;
00500   int inner_iter=0;
00501     bool one_patch = false;
00502 
00503     // Clear culling flag, set hard fixed flag, etc on all vertices
00504   MeshDomainAssoc mesh_and_domain = MeshDomainAssoc((Mesh*)mesh, 0);
00505   initialize_vertex_byte( &mesh_and_domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00506 
00507     // Get the patch data to use for the first iteration
00508   OFEvaluator& obj_func = get_objective_function_evaluator();
00509   
00510   PatchData patch;
00511   patch.set_mesh( (Mesh*) mesh );
00512   patch.set_domain( domain );
00513   patch.attach_settings( settings );
00514 
00515   ParallelHelper* helper = mesh->get_parallel_helper();
00516   if (!helper) {
00517     MSQ_SETERR(err)("No ParallelHelper instance", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00518     return 0;
00519   }
00520 
00521   helper->smoothing_init(err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00522 
00523   bool inner_crit_terminated, all_culled;
00524   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> patch_vertices;
00525   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> patch_elements;
00526   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> fixed_vertices;
00527   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> free_vertices;
00528    
00529     // Get termination criteria
00530   TerminationCriterion* outer_crit=this->get_outer_termination_criterion();
00531   TerminationCriterion* inner_crit=this->get_inner_termination_criterion();
00532   if(outer_crit == 0){
00533     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Termination Criterion pointer is Null", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00534     return 0.;
00535   }
00536   if(inner_crit == 0){
00537     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Termination Criterion pointer for inner loop is Null", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00538     return 0.;
00539   }
00540   
00541   PatchSet* patch_set = get_patch_set();
00542   if (!patch_set) {
00543     MSQ_SETERR(err)("No PatchSet for QualityImprover!", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00544     return 0.0;
00545   }
00546   patch_set->set_mesh( (Mesh*)mesh );
00547 
00548   std::vector<PatchSet::PatchHandle> patch_list;
00549   patch_set->get_patch_handles( patch_list, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00550   
00551     if (patch_list.size() > 1) 
00552       inner_crit->set_debug_output_level(3);
00553     else
00554       one_patch = true;
00555 
00556   if (jacobiOpt) {
00557     coord_tag = get_jacobi_coord_tag(mesh, err);
00558     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00559     coord_tag_ptr = &coord_tag;
00560   }
00561   
00562   // parallel error checking
00563   MsqError perr;
00564   bool pdone=false;
00565 
00566 #define PERROR_COND continue
00567 
00568     // Initialize outer loop
00569     
00570   this->initialize(patch, err); 
00571   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("initialize patch", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); } //goto ERROR;
00572   
00573   MeshDomainAssoc mesh_and_domain2 = MeshDomainAssoc((Mesh*)mesh, domain);
00574   obj_func.initialize( &mesh_and_domain2, settings, patch_set, err ); 
00575   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("initialize obj_func", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);} //goto ERROR;
00576   
00577   outer_crit->reset_outer( (Mesh*)mesh, domain, obj_func, settings, err); 
00578   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("reset_outer", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);} //goto ERROR;
00579    
00580    // Loop until outer termination criterion is met
00581   inner_crit_terminated = false;
00582   all_culled = false;
00583   for (;;)
00584   {
00585     if (0)
00586       std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk inner_iter= " << inner_iter << " outer_iter= " << outer_iter << std::endl;
00587 
00588     //PERROR:
00589 
00590     if (MSQ_CHKERR(perr))
00591       {
00592         std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] VertexMover::loop_over_mesh found parallel error: " << perr << "\n quitting... pdone= " << pdone << std::endl;
00593         pdone = true;
00594       }
00595 
00596     helper->communicate_any_true (pdone, err);
00597 
00598     if (0)
00599       std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk inner_iter= " << inner_iter << " outer_iter= " << outer_iter << " pdone= " << pdone << std::endl;
00600 
00601     if (pdone)
00602       {
00603         std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] VertexMover::loop_over_mesh found parallel error, quitting... pdone= " << pdone << std::endl;
00604         MSQ_SETERR(err)("PARALLEL ERROR", MsqError::PARALLEL_ERROR);
00605         break;
00606       }
00607 
00608     ++outer_iter;
00609 
00622 
00623     bool outer_crit_terminated = outer_crit->terminate();
00624     bool outer_crit_terminated_local = outer_crit_terminated;
00625     helper->communicate_all_true( outer_crit_terminated, err ); 
00626 
00627     bool inner_crit_terminated_local = inner_crit_terminated;
00628     helper->communicate_all_true( inner_crit_terminated, err ); 
00629 
00630     bool all_culled_local = all_culled;
00631     helper->communicate_all_true( all_culled, err ); 
00632 
00633     bool done = all_culled || outer_crit_terminated;
00634     if (inner_crit_terminated) {
00635       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Inner termination criterion satisfied for all patches "
00636                       "without meeting outer termination criterion.  This is "
00637                       "an infinite loop.  Aborting.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00638       done = true;
00639       helper->communicate_any_true( done, err ); 
00640     }
00641 
00642     bool local_done=done;
00643 
00644     helper->communicate_all_true( done, err ); 
00645 
00646     if (0)
00647       std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk done= " << done << " local_done= " << local_done 
00648                 << " all_culled= " << all_culled 
00649                 << " outer_crit->terminate()= " << outer_crit->terminate()
00650                 << " outer_term= " << outer_crit_terminated
00651                 << " outer_term_local= " << outer_crit_terminated_local
00652                 << " inner_crit_terminated = " << inner_crit_terminated
00653                 << " inner_crit_terminated_local = " << inner_crit_terminated_local
00654                 << " all_culled = " << all_culled
00655                 << " all_culled_local = " << all_culled_local
00656                 << std::endl;
00657 
00658     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("loop start", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);} //goto ERROR;
00659 
00660 
00661     if (done)
00662       break;
00663     
00664     
00665     inner_crit_terminated = true;
00666     all_culled = true;
00667 
00669 
00670     // get the fixed vertices (i.e. the ones *not* part of the first independent set)
00671     helper->compute_first_independent_set(fixed_vertices); 
00672 
00673     // sort the fixed vertices
00674     std::sort(fixed_vertices.begin(), fixed_vertices.end());
00675 
00676       // Loop over each patch
00677         if (0 && MSQ_DBG(2))
00678           std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk number of patches = " << patch_list.size() 
00679                     << " inner_iter= " << inner_iter << " outer_iter= " << outer_iter 
00680                     << " inner.globalInvertedCount = " << inner_crit->globalInvertedCount
00681                     << " outer.globalInvertedCount = " << outer_crit->globalInvertedCount
00682                     << " inner.patchInvertedCount = " << inner_crit->patchInvertedCount
00683                     << " outer.patchInvertedCount = " << outer_crit->patchInvertedCount
00684                     << std::endl;
00685 
00686         save_or_restore_debug_state(true);
00687         //MsqDebug::disable_all();
00688       
00689         int num_patches=0;
00690 
00691     std::vector<PatchSet::PatchHandle>::iterator p_iter = patch_list.begin();
00692     while( p_iter != patch_list.end() )
00693     {
00694 
00695 
00696       // loop until we get a non-empty patch.  patch will be empty
00697       // for culled vertices with element-on-vertex patches
00698       do {
00699         patch_set->get_patch( *p_iter, patch_elements, patch_vertices, err );
00700         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("get_patch", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00701         ++p_iter;
00702       } while (patch_elements.empty() && p_iter != patch_list.end()) ;
00703         
00704       if (patch_elements.empty()) { // no more non-culled vertices
00705               if (0)
00706                 std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk all vertices culled."  << std::endl;
00707         break;
00708       }
00709 
00710       if (patch_vertices.empty()) // global patch hack (means all mesh vertices)
00711       {
00712         mesh->get_all_vertices(patch_vertices, err);
00713       }
00714 
00715       free_vertices.clear();
00716 
00717       for (size_t i = 0; i < patch_vertices.size(); ++i) 
00718         if (!std::binary_search(fixed_vertices.begin(), fixed_vertices.end(), patch_vertices[i]))
00719           free_vertices.push_back(patch_vertices[i]);
00720 
00721       if (free_vertices.empty()) { // all vertices were fixed -> skip patch
00722         continue;
00723       }
00724 
00725             ++num_patches;
00726       all_culled = false;
00727       patch.set_mesh_entities( patch_elements, free_vertices, err );
00728       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("set_mesh_entities", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00729         
00730         // Initialize for inner iteration
00731         
00732       this->initialize_mesh_iteration(patch, err);
00733       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("initialize_mesh_iteration", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00734       
00735       obj_func.reset();
00736       
00737       outer_crit->reset_patch( patch, err );
00738       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("reset_patch outer", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00739       
00740       inner_crit->reset_inner( patch, obj_func, err );
00741       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("reset_inner", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00742       
00743       inner_crit->reset_patch( patch, err );
00744       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("inner reset_patch", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00745       
00746         // Don't even call optimizer if inner termination 
00747         // criterion has already been met.
00748       if (!inner_crit->terminate())
00749       {
00750         inner_crit_terminated = false;
00751         if (one_patch) ++inner_iter;
00752 
00753           // Call optimizer - should loop on inner_crit->terminate()
00754                 size_t num_vert=patch.num_free_vertices();
00755                 //std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk VertexMover num_vert= " << num_vert << std::endl;
00756               
00757         this->optimize_vertex_positions( patch, err );
00758         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("optimize_vertex_positions", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00759       
00760           // Update for changes during inner iteration 
00761           // (during optimizer loop)
00762         
00763         outer_crit->accumulate_patch( patch, err );
00764         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("outer accumulate_patch", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00765         
00766         inner_crit->cull_vertices( patch, obj_func, err );
00767         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("inner cull_vertices", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00768 
00769                 // experimental...
00770                 if (0)
00771                   {
00772                     inner_crit->cull_vertices_global (patch, 
00773                                                       mesh, domain, settings,
00774                                                       obj_func, err);
00775                     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("cull_vertices_global", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00776                   }
00777         
00778         patch.update_mesh( err, coord_tag_ptr );
00779         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("update_mesh", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00780       }
00781     } // while(p_iter....
00782 
00783     save_or_restore_debug_state(false);
00784 
00785     if (1)
00786       {
00787         bool pdone_inner=false;
00788 
00789         if (MSQ_CHKERR(perr))
00790           {
00791             std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] VertexMover::loop_over_mesh found parallel error: " << perr << "\n quitting... pdone_inner= " << pdone_inner << std::endl;
00792             pdone_inner = true;
00793           }
00794 
00795         helper->communicate_any_true (pdone_inner, err);
00796 
00797         if (0)
00798           std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk inner_iter= " << inner_iter << " outer_iter= " << outer_iter << " pdone_inner= " << pdone_inner << std::endl;
00799 
00800         if (pdone_inner)
00801           {
00802              if (0)
00803               std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk found parallel error, quitting... pdone_inner= " << pdone_inner << std::endl;
00804             MSQ_SETERR(err)("PARALLEL ERROR", MsqError::PARALLEL_ERROR);
00805             break;
00806           }
00807       }
00808 
00810     std::vector<unsigned char> saved_bytes;
00811     checkpoint_bytes(mesh, saved_bytes, err); 
00812     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("checkpoint_bytes ", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00813 
00814     helper->communicate_first_independent_set(err); 
00815     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("communicate_first_independent_set ", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00816 
00818         save_or_restore_debug_state(true);
00819         MsqDebug::disable_all();
00820 
00821     while (helper->compute_next_independent_set())
00822     {
00823       // Loop over all boundary elements
00824       while(helper->get_next_partition_boundary_vertex(vertex_handle))
00825       {
00826 
00827         patch_vertices.clear();
00828         patch_vertices.push_back(vertex_handle);
00829         patch_elements.clear(); 
00830         mesh->vertices_get_attached_elements( &vertex_handle, 
00831                                               1,
00832                                               patch_elements, 
00833                                               junk, err );
00834 
00835         all_culled = false;
00836         patch.set_mesh_entities( patch_elements, patch_vertices, err );
00837 
00838         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("set_mesh_entities 2 ", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00839         
00840         // Initialize for inner iteration
00841         
00842         this->initialize_mesh_iteration(patch, err);
00843         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" initialize_mesh_iteration 2", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00844         
00845         obj_func.reset();
00846         
00847         outer_crit->reset_patch( patch, err );
00848         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)("outer reset_patch 2 ", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00849         
00850         inner_crit->reset_inner( patch, obj_func, err );
00851         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" inner reset_inner 2", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00852       
00853         inner_crit->reset_patch( patch, err );
00854         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" inner_crit reset_patch 2", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00855       
00856         // Don't even call optimizer if inner termination 
00857         // criterion has already been met.
00858         if (!inner_crit->terminate())
00859         {
00860           inner_crit_terminated = false;
00861           
00862           // Call optimizer - should loop on inner_crit->terminate()
00863           this->optimize_vertex_positions( patch, err );
00864           if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" optimize_vertex_positions 2", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00865       
00866           // Update for changes during inner iteration 
00867           // (during optimizer loop)
00868           
00869           outer_crit->accumulate_patch( patch, err );
00870           if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" outer accumulate_patch 2", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00871           
00872           inner_crit->cull_vertices( patch, obj_func, err );
00873           if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" inner cull_vertices", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00874 
00875                     // FIXME
00876                     if (0)
00877                       {
00878                         inner_crit->cull_vertices_global (patch, 
00879                                                           mesh, domain, settings,
00880                                                           obj_func, err);
00881                         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" cull_vertices_global 2 ", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00882                       }
00883         
00884           patch.update_mesh( err, coord_tag_ptr );
00885           if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" update_mesh 2", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00886         }
00887       }
00888       helper->communicate_next_independent_set(err);
00889       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" communicate_next_independent_set 2", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00890      } // while(helper->compute_next_independent_set())
00891  
00892     save_or_restore_debug_state(false);
00893  
00894     //if (!get_parallel_rank())
00895     //std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp srk num_patches= " << num_patches << std::endl;
00896 
00898     restore_bytes(mesh, saved_bytes, err);
00899     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" restore_bytes", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00900 
00901     if (jacobiOpt)
00902       commit_jacobi_coords( coord_tag, mesh, err );
00903 
00904     this->terminate_mesh_iteration(patch, err); 
00905     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" terminate_mesh_iteration", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00906     
00907     outer_crit->accumulate_outer( mesh, domain, obj_func, settings, err );
00908     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) { MSQ_SETERR(perr)(" outer_crit accumulate_outer", MsqError::INVALID_STATE); PERROR_COND; } //goto ERROR;
00909   }
00910 
00911 //ERROR: 
00912 
00913   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) {
00914     std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] VertexMover::loop_over_mesh error = " << err.error_message() << std::endl;
00915   }
00916 
00917   if (jacobiOpt)
00918     mesh->tag_delete( coord_tag, err );
00919 
00920     //call the criteria's cleanup funtions.
00921   outer_crit->cleanup(mesh,domain,err); MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00922   inner_crit->cleanup(mesh,domain,err); MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00923     //call the optimization cleanup function.
00924   this->cleanup();
00925     // close the helper
00926   helper->smoothing_close(err); MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00927 
00928   return 0.;
00929 }
00930 
00931     
00932 void VertexMover::initialize_queue( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00933                                     const Settings* settings,
00934                                     MsqError& err )
00935 {
00936   QualityImprover::initialize_queue( mesh_and_domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00937   objFuncEval.initialize_queue( mesh_and_domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00938 }
00939 
00940 TagHandle VertexMover::get_jacobi_coord_tag( Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00941 {
00942     // Get tag handle
00943   const char tagname[] = "msq_jacobi_temp_coords";
00944   TagHandle tag = mesh->tag_create( tagname, Mesh::DOUBLE, 3, 0, err );  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00945     /* VertexMover will always delete the tag when it is done, so it is probably
00946        best not to accept an existing tag
00947   if (err.error_code() == TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS) {
00948     err.clear();
00949     tag = tag_get( tagname, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00950     std::string name;
00951     Mesh::TagType type;
00952     unsigned length;
00953     mesh->tag_properties( tag, name, type, length, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00954     if (type != Mesh::DOUBLE || length != 3) {
00955       MSQ_SETERR(err)(TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS,
00956                      "Tag \"%s\" already exists with invalid type", 
00957                      tagname);
00958       return 0;
00959     }
00960   }
00961     */
00962   
00963     // Initialize tag value with initial vertex coordinates so that
00964     // vertices that never get moved end up with the correct coords.
00965   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertices;
00966   mesh->get_all_vertices( vertices, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00967     // remove fixed vertices
00968     // to avoid really huge arrays (especially since we need to copy
00969     // coords out of annoying MsqVertex class to double array), work
00970     // in blocks
00971   const size_t blocksize = 4096;
00972   std::vector<bool> fixed(blocksize);
00973   MsqVertex coords[blocksize];
00974   double tag_data[3*blocksize];
00975   for (size_t i = 0; i < vertices.size(); i += blocksize) {
00976     size_t count = std::min( blocksize, vertices.size() - i );
00977       // remove fixed vertices
00978     mesh->vertices_get_fixed_flag( &vertices[i], fixed, count, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00979     size_t w = 0;
00980     for (size_t j = 0; j < count; ++j)
00981       if (!fixed[j])
00982         vertices[i + w++] = vertices[i + j];
00983     count = w;
00984       // store tag data for free vertices
00985     mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( &vertices[i], coords, count, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00986     for (size_t j = 0; j < count; ++j) {
00987       tag_data[3*j  ] = coords[j][0];
00988       tag_data[3*j+1] = coords[j][1];
00989       tag_data[3*j+2] = coords[j][2];
00990     }
00991     mesh->tag_set_vertex_data( tag, count, &vertices[i], tag_data, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00992   }
00993   
00994   return tag;
00995 }
00996 
00997 void VertexMover::commit_jacobi_coords( TagHandle tag, Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00998 {
00999   Vector3D coords;
01000   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertices;
01001   mesh->get_all_vertices( vertices, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01002   std::vector<bool> fixed( vertices.size() );
01003   mesh->vertices_get_fixed_flag( &vertices[0], fixed, vertices.size(), err );
01004   for (size_t i = 0; i < vertices.size(); ++i) {
01005     if (!fixed[i]) {
01006       mesh->tag_get_vertex_data( tag, 1, &vertices[i], coords.to_array(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01007       mesh->vertex_set_coordinates( vertices[i], coords, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01008     }
01009   }
01010 }
01011 
01012 } // namespace Mesquite
